name: Gary The Rescucer
description:
Gary the Rescuer is about a side character named Gary and every time the main character swing by they always make a mess, unleashing all the animals into the wild. It's your job to find them and catch them all. Do you have what it take to be Gary the Rescuer?

Created as part of the Global Game Jam 2021, https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/gary-rescuer-8

Credits: 

Programmer: Timothy Janssen & Gustavo Lattari

Level Designer: Gustavo Lattari & Elliott Battle

Character Artist: Matthew Jones

Level Artist: Keith at Fertile Soil Productions
Asset Pack from https://fertile-soil-productions.itch.io/modular-terrain-pack

Audio Composer: Michael Schiciano

UI Designer: Dang Nguyen

In Memory of Lucy the Ferret
